name: Hit the Brix
description:
Controls: R to restart the level immediately, WASD to aim the ball (through arrow), SPACE to shoot the ball (& the fox inside); starting from level 8, there's a movable brick that is controlled by left-clicking on screen.

My first game ever, so you might expect everything that comes with it (i. e. mistakes were made). It has ten levels with no win screen, 'cause I forgot to add it and compiling for WebGL isn't trivial on my laptop. So yeah, it's a small game, but it's mine and it's finished. If you play it, or even finish it, shoot me a tweet @behxmot, I'd be psyched!
